Config Management Camp

5 - 7 February, 2018

Gent, Belgium

How to debug Salt

Megan Wilhite

This session will dive into Salt internals to help attendees learn about ways to gain even more performance from Salt to optimize infrastructure automation. We will walk through helpful techniques for debugging and fixing errors when they do occur and learn how to improve visibility into the performance of a SaltStack environment.

About the Speaker

Megan Wilhite, SaltStack QA engineer
